anh27102003 wrote:
> some how when i added junit to classpath
> i can't run normal program, error with NoClassDefFoundxxx
> then i took it out, it ran okie
> 
> 
> any ideas?

By chance, did you install junit.jar to C:\Program Files?
By chance, did you add C:\Program Files\junit.jar to your Windows 
(system wide) CLASSPATH variable?
